TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He was represented before the ORG by Mr P .- PERSON , of ORG .

On DATE a part publicly owned company , ORG parisienne de prestations ( SEMPAP ) , was set up , with GPE as its majority shareholder . The chairperson of its board of directors was also chairperson of the tenders committee . SEMPAP , which was formed to replace GPE Paris Stationery Office ( Imprimerie municipale de la ville de Paris ) , entered into a number of contracts with suppliers . GPE reported unfavourably on its operations in DATE and DATE .

On DATE , following the forwarding of a report from ORG to the GPE public prosecutor on CARDINAL DATE , a judicial investigation was opened at the GPE tribunal de grande instance against an unnamed person for favouritism in the award of public contracts for supplies and printing services by ORG . CARDINAL investigating judges from the court were put in charge of the investigation .

On DATE the ORG remit was extended to cover embezzlement of public funds , misappropriation of corporate assets , acquiring or retaining a prohibited interest or complicity therein , receipt of stolen goods and aiding and abetting .
By a judgment of DATE , ORG gave the applicant leave under LAW ,

“ at his own risk and expense , to join the proceedings as a civil party in place of GPE in the judicial investigation opened into the alleged over - billing of GPE for contracts made through ORG ’s intermediary ” .
On DATE the applicant asked the investigating judges to order the examination , as a witness , of Mr PERSON , who was the mayor of GPE until DATE and has been President of GPE since then .

By an order of DATE the judges , who noted that the request had been written in accusatory terms that effectively levelled charges against Mr PERSON , held that , in the absence of specific case - law from ORG concerning ORG position ( decision of DATE ) with regard to the President of the LOC ’s immunity , they did not have jurisdiction to order such a measure .
On DATE ORG of ORG , before which the applicant had revised his request , now seeking an order for PERSON PERSON to be placed under investigation , upheld the order of DATE .

By a judgment of DATE ORG , sitting in plenary , held that proceedings could not be brought before the ordinary criminal courts for the duration of the President ’s term of office , during which period the right to prosecute was suspended . The appeal judgment had therefore erred in holding that the appeal was admissible and that the investigating judges did not have jurisdiction , but would not be reversed as the investigating judges did not in fact have power to order an investigative measure of this sort .

“ The territorial authorities of the Republic shall be the municipalities , the départements , the regions , the special - status areas and the overseas territories to which LAW applies . Any other territorial authority shall be established by statute , where appropriate in place of one or more authorities referred to in this paragraph . ”

“ Any taxpayer registered on the municipal electoral roll shall be entitled , at his or her own risk and expense and with the leave of the administrative court , to bring or defend any action which he or she believes the municipality should bring or defend but has refused or neglected to do so after being put on notice to consider the matter . ”

“ When examining a request submitted by a taxpayer on the basis of [ Article L. CARDINAL - CARDINAL of LAW ] , the administrative court , ruling in its capacity as an administrative authority , and the ORG d’Etat , on a full appeal against a decision by the administrative court , shall , without acting as the trial judge and in the light of the evidence before them , check whether the action contemplated is of sufficient public interest for the municipality and has a prospect of success . ”
